snippet: We're inviting students, teachers and youth sports coaches to join The Learning Network and John Branch, a sports reporter, for a live Facebook chat at 8 p.m. Eastern time on Wednesday.
abstract: We're inviting students, teachers and youth sports coaches to join The Learning Network and John Branch, a sports reporter, for a live Facebook chat at 8 p.m. Eastern time on Wednesday.

byline.original: By HOLLY EPSTEIN OJALVO and KATHERINE SCHULTEN

headline.main: Please Join Us: Student Facebook Chat With a Times Reporter
